content.text: Learn how to add a button to an image with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to add a button to an image with CSS.

content.text: How To Add Button over Image

content.code_html:
<div class="container">
  <img src="img_snow.jpg" alt="Snow">
  <button class="btn">Button</button>
</div>

syntaxHighlighting.text: /* Container needed to position the button. Adjust the width as needed */

/* Style the button and place it in the middle of 
  the container/image */

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Container needed to position the button. Adjust the width as needed */

/* Style the button and place it in the middle of 
  the container/image */

content.code_html:
/* Container needed to position the button. Adjust the width as needed */
.container {
  position: relative;
  width: 50%;
}

/* Make the image responsive */
.container img {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}

/* Style the button and place it in the middle of the container/image */
.container .btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  -ms-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  background-color: #555;
  color: white;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.container .btn:hover {
  background-color: black;
}
